wikipedia_page.main: Marc David Canham (born 11 September 1982) is a footballer who plays for Bath City as a midfielder.

response: * Marc Canham (born 1982), Footballer in English leagues

Marc Canham is a British composer of music for film and video games. In 2008, he scored Far Cry 2, and in 2020, he composed the film score to I Care A Lot, a Netflix film. Canham has collaborated with several artists including Iggy Pop, Nathan Johnson, Philip Glass, Baaba Maal, Bryan Mantia, and Paul Hartnoll.
